thread.title: While Peyton struggles, Denver 'D' keeps Broncos in game
thread.title_full: While Peyton struggles, Denver 'D' keeps Broncos in game

author: EDDIE PELLS
title: While Peyton struggles, Denver 'D' keeps Broncos in game
text:
Jack Dempsey While Peyton struggles, Denver 'D' keeps Broncos in game 
FILE - In this Sept. 13, 2015, file photo, Denver Broncos cornerback Aqib Talib scores against the Baltimore Ravens during the second half of an NFL football game in Denver. Six games into the season, the Broncos' defense is looking like one of the best to ever play. (AP Photo/Jack Dempsey, File) John Bazemore While Peyton struggles, Denver 'D' keeps Broncos in game 
FILE - In this Jan. 7, 2001, file photo, Baltimore Ravens linebacker Peter Boulware celebrates as he leaves the field in Nashville, Tenn., after the Ravens defeated the Tennessee Titans 24-10 in the AFC playoff football game. The 2000 Ravens had a top-ranked defense, propping up an offense that often went nowhere. (AP Photo/John Bazemore, File) Matthew Gunby While Peyton struggles, Denver 'D' keeps Broncos in game 
FILE - In this Sept. 17, 2006, file photo, Baltimore Ravens linebacker Ray Lewis (52) reacts after the Ravens got a safety by sacking Oakland Raiders quarterback Andrew Walter in the end zone during an NFL football game in Baltimore. (AP Photo/Matthew Gunby, File) Marcio Jose Sanchez While Peyton struggles, Denver 'D' keeps Broncos in game 
FILE - In this Oct. 11, 2015, file photo, Denver Broncos cornerback Chris Harris (25) returns an interception from Oakland Raiders quarterback Derek Carr for a 74-yard touchdown during the second half of an NFL football game in Oakland, Calif. Six games into the season, the Broncos' defense is looking like one of the best to ever play. (AP Photo/Marcio Jose Sanchez, File) Posted: Friday, October 23, 2015 1:30 pm | Updated: 2:01 pm, Fri Oct 23, 2015. 
DENVER (AP) — Not so long ago, Peyton Manning had the Denver Broncos offense scoring at a record-setting clip. Those days are gone. 
Now, it's the defense pulling most of the weight and even providing some scoring. Subscription Required An online service is needed to view this article in its entirety.
